name: Dead Slash
description:
Bringing arcade game experience to your fingertips, welcome to the first-person rail slasher inspired by 90’s arcade horror games.

Alone in a spooky world, full of the undead running endlessly hacking and slashing your way through hordes of monsters and bosses. Collect power-up cards in this rouge-like rail slasher on your way to survival and hopefully to the top of the leader board!
